author: tng
msg: DOM L3: Not to deviate from the spec, DOMBuilder::parseXXX methods should not take reuse as parameters
Similar to SAX2XMLReader, reuse flag should be set through setFeature.
Besides add non-standard extension set/getProperty for setting the schemalocation property.

author: tng
msg: To be consistent, SAX2 is updated with:
1. the progressive parse methods should use the fReuseGrammar flag set from setFeature instead of using parameter
2. add feature "http://apache.org/xml/features/continue-after-fatal-error", and users should use setFeature instead of setExitOnFirstFatalError
3. add feature "http://apache.org/xml/features/validation-error-as-fatal", and users should use setFeature instead of setValidationConstraintFatal

author: tng
msg: Name Xerces features as XMLUni::fgXercesXXXX instead of XMLUni::fgSAX2XercesXXXX so that they can be shared with DOM parser.
